sentences.en: A pheasant is a delicacy we seldom can enjoy.
sentences.cn: 野鸡是我们很少能品尝到的美味.

sentences.en: Even Ford, who seldom smiled, laughed out loud a few times.
sentences.cn: 即使是很少笑的福特，有几次也笑出声来。

sentences.en: He had seldom seen a child with so much talent.
sentences.cn: 有如此天赋的孩子他以往没见过几个。
他简直可以说从不喝酒.

sentences.en: It is seldom that it rains in such a time in winter.
sentences.cn: 在冬天这个时候很少下雨.

sentences.en: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.cn: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

sentences.en: On Sundays, he seldom stays in the house.
sentences.cn: 星期天他很少待在房子里.

sentences.en: Seldom have I heard such beautiful singing.
sentences.cn: 我很少听到过如此美妙的歌声.

sentences.en: She seldom or never writes to us.
The compensations for the injuries seldom yield complete satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 伤害赔偿很少使受害人称心如意.

sentences.en: They seldom talk on politics in those days.
sentences.cn: 那时人们很少谈论政治.

phrases.tran_cn:
极难得,简直不,几乎不：

He seldom or never drinks.
他简直可以说滴酒不沾。
